mapper.select: select a.qnaNum, a.soId, a.qnaTitle, a.qnaContent, a.qnaWritedate, a.qnaCategory, a.qnaComplete, b.qnaReplyContent from soqna a,soqnareply b where a.qnaNum = b.qnaNum(+) and soId=#{soId} order by a.qnaNum desc

select a.qnaNum, a.soId, a.qnaTitle, a.qnaContent, a.qnaWritedate, a.qnaCategory, a.qnaComplete, b.qnaReplyContent from soqna a,soqnareply b where a.qnaNum = b.qnaNum(+) and soId=#{soId} and a.qnaComplete=#{searchName} order by a.qnaNum desc

select a.qnaNum, a.soId, a.qnaTitle, a.qnaContent, a.qnaWritedate, a.qnaCategory, a.qnaComplete, b.qnaReplyContent from soqna a,soqnareply b
where a.qnaNum = b.qnaNum(+) and soId=#{soId} and a.qnaComplete=#{searchName} and (sysdate-a.qnaWritedate)<=7
where a.qnaNum = b.qnaNum(+) and soId=#{soId} and a.qnaComplete=#{searchName} and (sysdate-a.qnaWritedate)<=30
order by qnaNum asc

select a.qnaNum, a.soId, a.qnaTitle, a.qnaContent, a.qnaWritedate, a.qnaCategory, a.qnaComplete, b.qnaReplyContent from soqna a,soqnareply b
where a.qnaNum = b.qnaNum(+) and soId=#{soId} and (sysdate-a.qnaWritedate)<=7
where a.qnaNum = b.qnaNum(+) and soId=#{soId} and (sysdate-a.qnaWritedate)<=30
order by qnaNum asc
mapper.insert: insert into soqna (qnaNum, soId, qnaTitle , qnaContent,qnaWritedate,qnaComplete,qnaCategory) values(SEQ_noticetoso_noticeNum.NEXTVAL, #{soId},#{qnaTitle},#{qnaContent},default,default,#{qnaCategory})
mapper.delete: delete from soqna where soId=#{soId} and qnaNum=#{qnaNum}
